When upgrading from a previous release, please be aware of the following incompatible changes:

listitem.para: gnome alias has been removed along with gtk, gtkmm and several others. Now you need to use versioned attributes, like gnome3.

A tmpfs is now mounted on /tmp by default during boot. This can be disabled by setting boot.tmpOnTmpfs to false, which is desirable on systems with little memory. Additionally, you may want to clean the contents of /tmp before upgrading.
